mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_info (role_id, role_name, role_code, role_desc, role_create_time, role_update_time, role_valid) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roleUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roleValid,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, role_code, role_desc, role_create_time, role_update_time, role_valid from sys_role_info where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
